article.headline: Butler 62, Illinois-Springfield 56
article.story: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) -- Drew Streicher came off the bench to score 15 points on 4-of-6 shooting as Butler held off Illinois-Springfield 62-56 Saturday night. Brandon Crone shot 4-of-7 from the floor for 12 points and added seven rebounds for the Bulldogs (4-0). Eddie Smith led the Prairie Stars (5-2) with a game-high 29 points on 11-of-19 shooting and hit 4-of-5 from 3-point range. Smith also grabbed five rebounds and had three assists. The Bulldogs built a 33-26 halftime lead and never trailed in the second half despite shooting only 7-of-20 (35 percent) in the second period. Butler held its largest lead of 11 points with 9:14 remaining. The Bulldogs outrebounded Illinois-Springfield 30-20 but were outscored 14-10 in the paint.
